title: mexite
author: mexite
content: Arguably, the most significant driver of Bitcoin value is its future price speculation. There have been several speculations of BTC price by top crypto influencers, while some have come to pass but it appears that the 100k price milestone appears elusive.The $60k prediction came to pass but BTC has since lost more than 65% of its ATH price. Do you think that BTC will ever rise to and above 100k in the near future? Wil it be before or after the next Bitcoin halving or this price would never come?What's your opinion?

Quote from: mexite on July 20, 2022, 09:08:28 PMWil it be before or after the next Bitcoin halving or this price would never come?It must be after. Bitcoin already reached the new price when it was getting done with the halving. You must see the previous history. Quote from: mexite on July 20, 2022, 09:08:28 PMWhat's your opinion? Im sure that it can but i also believe if bitcoin can't reach that in short time caused by the global crisis that was making so many people feeling fear.

comments.body: Things are changing in the world very quickly. We saw BTC pump to its ATH previously when Musk said Tesla was buying, El Salvador made it a legal currency, and the Ukraine war was about to start. Similar world events could easily pump BTC to 100k. Personally, and being that this is an altcoin speculation board, I feel that ALTs will have the highest returns, especially microcap gems like Wanna, CNDL, Rose and TRI.

comments.body: Since I also bought BTC at $5000 and sold it at $40000, I don't think it's going to go up again in the future. No doubt 100k may possible in the future.
